+heavy_description: The addition of chain mail, metal plates, a metal helm
a_blade_or_two_description: Perhaps you carry a saber, a set of daggers, a meat cleaver, a cheese fork, or a dueling foil.
a_large_weapon_description: A two-handed weapon such as a battle axe or hunting rifle.
a_pistol_description: A heavy, single-shot, breech-loading firearm. Devastating at 20 paces, slow to reload.
an_unusual_weapon_description: A curiosity or tool turned into a weapon. A whip, a flail, a hatchet, a shovel, a length of chain, a razor-edged fan, steel-toed boots.
arcane_implements_description: A vial of quicksilver. A pouch of black salt. A spirit anchor in the form of a small stone. A spirit bottle. A vial of electroplasm, designed to break and splatter on impact.
armor_description: A thick leather tunic plus reinforced gloves and boots.
attune_description: Attune to spirits and the ghost field; channel electroplasmic energy; perceive and communicate with ghosts; understand spectrology.
autofill_reminder_crew: To generate crew abilities, upgrades, contacts, and claims, enter the name of the crew type above:
autofill_reminder_playbook: To generate playbook abilities, items, and friends, enter the name of the playbook above:
background_info: Academic — Labor — Law — Trade — Military — Noble — Underworld
body_description: Resist consequences from physical strain or injury.
bolster: Bolster your crew's reputation or develop a new one.
burglary_gear_description: A set of lockpicks. A small pry-bar. Vials of oil to silence squeaky hinges. A coil of wire and fishing hooks. A small pouch of fine sand.
channel_description: Open your mind to otherworldly power; safely handle or create mystical artifacts; bend the laws of reality; invoke dark pacts with powerful beings.
chat_image: Image to show alongside chat rolls
claim_above_the_law_description:
-1 Wanted Level
if Citizens faction
status is +3
claim_ancient_obelisk_description:
-1 stress cost for
all arcane powers
and rituals
claim_ancient_tower_description:
+1d to Consort
w/ arcane entities
on site
claim_catacombs_description:
+1d to Study or
Tinker on site
claim_cover_identities_description:
+1d engagement
for deception and
transport plans
claim_defiant_citizens_description:
Large gang who
will fight for you
claim_doskvol's_most_wanted_description:
+2 rep on scores
against the law
claim_fleet_description:
Your cohorts have
their own vehicles
claim_hagfish_farm_description:
Body disposal,
+1d to reduce heat
after killing
claim_hidden_paths_description:
+1d to Prowl back
to your lair
claim_interrogation_chamber_description:
+1d to Command
and Sway on site
claim_local_graft_description:
+2 coin for
show of force or
socialize
claim_lookouts_description:
+1d to Survey or
Hunt on your turf
claim_luxury_venue_description:
+1d to Consort
and Sway on site
claim_sanctuary_description:
+1d to Command
and Sway on site
claim_surplus_caches_description:
+2 coin for product
sale or supply
claim_tavern_description:
+1d to Consort
and Sway on site
claim_warehouse_description:
Stockpiles give you
+1d to acquire
assets
claim_warehouses_description:
Stockpiles give you
+1d to acquire
assets
climbing_gear_description: A large coil of rope. A small coil of rope. Grappling hooks. A small pouch of chalk dust. A climbing harness with loops and metal rings. A set of iron pitons and a small mallet.
command_description: Dispense orders to those who serve you; intimidate or threaten; pressure others with a cutting remark or social power.
consort_description: Consort with connections from your heritage, background, friends, or rivals to gain access to resources, information, people, or places.
crew_ability_accord_description: Sometimes friends are as good as territory. You may count up to three +3 faction statuses you hold as if they are turf.
crew_ability_all_hands_description: During downtime, one of your cohorts may perform a downtime activity for the crew to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or work on a long-term project.
crew_ability_anointed_description: You get +1d to resistance rolls against supernatural threats. You get +1d to healing rolls when you have supernatural harm.
crew_ability_as_good_as_your_word_descri: You may spend rep as coin in downtime actions. Vigilantes gain Obligation as a second vice.
crew_ability_avengers_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Prowl, or Command (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_blood_brothers_description: When you fight alongside your cohorts in combat, they get +1d for teamwork rolls (setup and group actions). All of your cohorts get the thugs type for free (if they're already thugs, add another type).
crew_ability_bound_in_darkness_descripti: You may use teamwork with any cult member, regardless of the distance separating you. By taking 1 stress, your whispered message is heard by every cultist.
crew_ability_chosen_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Attune, Study, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_conviction_description: Each PC gains an additional Vice: Worship. When you indulge this vice and bring a pleasing sacrifice, you don't overindulge if you clear excess stress. In addition, your deity will assist any one action roll you make — from now until you indulge this vice again.
crew_ability_crow's_veil_description: Due to hard-won experience or occult ritual, your activities are hidden from the notice of the death-seeker crows. You don't take extra heat when killing is involved on a score.
crew_ability_dangerous_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Skirmish, or Wreck (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_deadly_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Prowl, or Skirmish (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_door_kickers_description: When you execute an assault plan, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_emberdeath_description: Due to hard-won experience or occult ritual, you know the arcane method to destroy a living victim's spirit at the moment you kill them. Take 3 stress to channel electroplasmic energy from the ghost field to disintegrate the spirit and dead body in a shower of sparking embers.
crew_ability_everyone_steals_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Prowl, Finesse, or Tinker (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_favors_description: Spend one rep and describe how one of your contacts is put out to help you. Everyone in your crew gets one dot in an action your contact is skilled in for this score.
crew_ability_fiends_description: Fear is as good as respect. You may count each wanted level as if it was turf.
crew_ability_forged_in_the_fire_descript: Each PC has been toughened by cruel experience. You get +1d to resistance rolls.
crew_ability_ghost_echoes_description: From weird experience or occult ritual, all crew members gain the ability to see and interact with the ghostly structures, streets, and objects within the echo of Doskvol that exists in the ghost field.
crew_ability_ghost_market_description: Through arcane ritual or hard-won experience, you have discovered how to prepare your product for sale to ghosts and/or demons. They do not pay in coin. What do they pay with?
crew_ability_ghost_passage_description: From harsh experience or occult ritual, all crew members become immune to possession by spirits, but may choose to "carry" a second ghost as a passenger within their body.
crew_ability_glory_incarnate_description: Your deity sometimes manifests in the physical world. This can be a great boon, but the priorities and values of a god are not those of mortals. You have been warned.
crew_ability_high_society_description: It's all about who you know. Take -1 heat during downtime and +1d to gather info about the city's elite.
crew_ability_hooked_description: Your gang members use your product. Add the savage, unreliable, or wild flaw to your gangs to give them +1 quality.
crew_ability_just_passing_through_descri: During downtime, take -1 heat. When your heat is 4 or less, you get +1d to deceive people when you pass yourselves off as ordinary citizens.
crew_ability_leverage_description: Your crew supplies contraband for other factions. Your success is good for them. Whenever you gain rep, gain +1 rep.
crew_ability_like_part_of_the_family_des: Create one of your vehicles as a cohort (use the vehicle edges and flaws, below). Its quality is equal to your Tier +1.
crew_ability_misdirection_description: At the end of a score, you may sacrifice half the rep gained to make another faction lose status with your target instead of your crew. How do you pin it on someone else?
crew_ability_moral_compass_description: Each PC gains an additional xp trigger: You fulfilled an obligation at a cost to you or the crew.
crew_ability_no_traces_description: When you keep an operation quiet or make it look like an accident, you get half the rep value of the target (round up) instead of zero. When you end downtime with zero heat, take +1 rep.
crew_ability_pack_rats_description: Your lair is a jumble of stolen items. When you roll to acquire an asset, take +1d.
crew_ability_patron_description: When you advance your Tier, it costs half the coin it normally would. Who is your patron? Why do they help you?
crew_ability_predators_description: When you use stealth or subterfuge to commit murder, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_reavers_description: When you go into conflict aboard a vehicle, you gain +1 effect for vehicle damage and speed. Your vehicle gains armor.
crew_ability_renegades_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Finesse, Prowl, or Skirmish (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_roots_description: During downtime one of your contacts or cohorts may take a downtime action to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or recover.
crew_ability_sealed_in_blood_description: Each human sacrifice yields -3 stress cost for any ritual you perform.
crew_ability_second_story_description: When you execute a clandestine infiltration, you get +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_silver_tongues_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Command, Consort, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_slippery_description: When you roll entanglements, roll twice and keep the one you want. When you reduce heat on the crew, take +1d.
crew_ability_synchronized_description: When you perform a group action, you may count multiple 6s from different rolls as a critical success.
crew_ability_the_good_stuff_description: Your merchandise is exquisite. The product quality is equal to your Tier+2. When you deal with a crew or faction, the GM will tell you who among them is hooked on your product (one, a few, many, or all).
crew_ability_thorn_in_your_side_descript: When you use Stealth or Assault plans against a higher Tier faction, your Tier counts as +1.
crew_ability_uncanny_preparation_descrip: Twice per session during a Desperate action, improve your effect or position. Describe a flashback that gives you the advantage now (setup action).
crew_ability_veteran_description: Choose a special ability from another crew (can be taken more than once).
crew_ability_vipers_description: When you acquire or craft poisons, you get +1 result level to your roll. When you employ a poison, you are specially prepared to be immune to its effects.
crew_ability_war_dogs_description: When you’re at war (-3 faction status), your crew does not suffer -1 hold and PCs still get two downtime activities, instead of just one.
crew_ability_zealotry_description: Your cohorts have abandoned their reason to devote themselves to the cult. They will undertake any service, no matter how dangerous or strange. They gain +1d to rolls against enemies of the faith.
crew_assassins_xp_condition: Execute a successful accident, disappearance, murder, or ransom operation.
crew_bravos_xp_condition: Execute a successful battle, extortion, sabotage, or smash & grab operation.
crew_cult_xp_condition: Advance the agenda of your deity or embody its precepts in action.
crew_hawkers_hunting_grounds_description: Sale — Supply — Show of Force — Socialize
crew_hawkers_xp_condition: Acquire product supply, execute clandestine/covert sales, or secure new territory.
crew_shadows_xp_condition: Execute a successful espionage, sabotage, or theft operation.
crew_smugglers_xp_condition: Execute a successful smuggling or acquire new clients or contraband sources.
crew_upgrade_assassin_rigging: Assassin rigging (2 free load of weapons or gear)
crew_upgrade_bravos_rigging: Bravos rigging (2 free load of weapons or armor)
crew_upgrade_camouflage: Camouflage (vehicles are perfectly concealed at rest)
crew_upgrade_cult_rigging: Cult rigging (2 free load of documents or implements)
crew_upgrade_hawker's_rigging: Hawker's rigging (1 carried item is concealed and has no load)
crew_upgrade_smuggler's_rigging: Smuggler's rigging (2 items carried are perfectly concealed)
crew_upgrade_thief_rigging: Thief Rigging (2 free load of tools or gear)
crew_upgrade_vigilantes_attire: Vigilantes attire (2 free load of weapons or supplies)
crew_vigilantes_xp_condition: Interfere with criminal scores, protect citizens, or antagonize the law.
deity_features_info: Alluring — Cruel — Ferocious — Monstrous — Radiant — Sinister — Serene — Transcendent
demolition_tools_description: A sledgehammer and iron spikes. Heavy drill. Crowbar.
documents_description: A collection of slim volumes on a variety of topics, including a registry of the nobility, City Watch commanders, and other notable citizens. Blank pages, a vial of ink, a pen. A number of interesting maps.
express_crew: Express the goals, drives, inner conflict, or essential nature of the crew.
fill_fields: Fill in sheet fields automatically upon entering or changing playbook or crew type
finesse_description: Finesse an item from someone's pocket; employ subtle misdirection or sleight-of-hand; handle a vehicle or a mount.
flexible_width: Flexible character sheet width (adapts to container)
flint_and_steel_description: Kept in a small embroidered case, it would be unfashionable to be caught without it. Also handy for starting fires.
functions_info: to guard — to destroy — to discover — to acquire — to labor at ... that which my master commands.
gatherinfo_how_can_I_blend: How can I blend in here?
gatherinfo_how_can_I_get_them: How can I get them to [X]?
gatherinfo_what_can_I_tinker: What can I tinker with here?
gatherinfo_what_do_they_intend: What do they intend to do?
gatherinfo_what_do_they_really: What do they really care about?
gatherinfo_what_drives_them: What drives them to do this?
gatherinfo_what_echoes: What echoes in the ghost field?
gatherinfo_what_echoes_in_the_weave: What echoes in the weave here?
gatherinfo_what_is_arcane: What is arcane or weird here?
gatherinfo_what_is_hidden: What is hidden or lost here?
gatherinfo_what_is_out_of_place: What is out of place here?
gatherinfo_what_should_I_look: What should I look out for?
ghost_viceblurb: You have an intense need: life essence. To satisfy this need, possess a living victim and consume their spirit energy (this may be a downtime action). When you do so, clear half your drain (round down).
heritage_info: Ilrien — Maur — Iberica — Calrais — Altori — The Jewel Cities (Beryl, Lapis, or Garnet)
hull_viceblurb: Your clockwork body runs on electroplasm. Recharge your capacitors by connecting to an industrial-grade generator (downtime action). When you do this, clear 5 drain.
hunt_description: Carefully track a target with skill and precision; wait for the perfect moment to act; discover the location of anything or anyone.
insight_description: Resist consequences from deception or understanding.
lantern_description: A simple oil lantern, a fancy electroplasmic lamp, or other light source.
list_crews: Assassins, Bravos, Cult, Hawkers, Shadows, Smugglers, or Vigilantes.
list_playbooks: Cutter, Hound, Leech, Lurk, Slide, Spider, Whisper, Ghost, Hull, or Vampire.
luck_charm_description: A small personal charm for keeping fortune on your side.
maneuver_description: Traverse quickly and skillfully; take advantage of the environment to gain an opportunity; navigate tricky situations with perfect timing.
mind_description: Resist consequences from deception or understanding.
name: Name
planningdesc: Choose a plan, provide the detail. Choose your load limit for the operation.
playbook_ability_a_good_name_description: When you push yourself in social engagements, while consorting or swaying, you can gain both +1 effect and +1d instead of one or the other.
playbook_ability_a_little_something_on_t: A Little Something on the Side
At the end of each downtime phase, you earn +2 stash.
playbook_ability_a_void_in_the_echo_desc: You are invisible to spirits and may not be harmed by them. Take 2 stress to cause living things to avert their gaze and fail to observe you for a few moments.
playbook_ability_alchemist_description: When you invent or craft a creation with alchemical features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special formula already known.
playbook_ability_ambush_description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d.
playbook_ability_analyst_description: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new formula or design plan.
playbook_ability_arcane_sight_descriptio: Take 1 stress to sense beyond human limits. "Hear" a subject's true thoughts or feelings, see in pitch darkness, sense the presence of invisible things, intuit the location of a hidden object, etc.
playbook_ability_artful_trespass_descrip: You gain +1d to survey rolls to notice security measures. Locks, guards, alarms, and so on. You also gain an additional gather information question: "What are they trying to keep me out of?" You gain +1d on the engagement roll for acting on that information.
playbook_ability_artificer_description: When you invent or craft a creation with spark-craft features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special design already known.
playbook_ability_attention_to_detail_des: You are a stickler for the details. Take +1d to your roll when working on a long-term project. You can also push yourself to ignore the drawback of a crafted device (unreliable, volatile, etc.)
playbook_ability_automaton_description: You are a spirit animating a clockwork body. You have human-like strength and senses, by default. Your hull has natural armor (this doesn't count for your load). Your former human feelings, interests, and connections are only dim memories. You now exist to fulfill your functions. Choose three. You may be rebuilt if damaged or destroyed. If your soul vessel is shattered, you are freed from servitude and become a Ghost. Whenever you would take stress, take drain instead.
playbook_ability_bad_reputation_descript: Sometimes a bad reputation is a good thing. Treat any social roll as a consort when dealing with "the wrong sort." Explain how they have heard of you, or know you/your reputation.
playbook_ability_baited_and_set_descript: You are a master planner. Gain one free flashback per errand, and take +1 effect when setting or having set a trap.
playbook_ability_battleborn_description: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.
playbook_ability_better_lucky_descriptio: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences of the action.
playbook_ability_better_to_be_a_tiger: Better to be a Tiger than a Man
playbook_ability_better_to_be_a_tiger_de: When ambushed, you gain +1 effect to all actions during a flashback, and your first flashback costs no stress. "Even if you have a tiger by the tail, you still have a tiger."
playbook_ability_bloody_but_unbowed_desc: You ignore the effects of all level 1 harm penalties when dueling or engaging in combat. When you push yourself to ignore level 3 harm penalties, it only takes 1 stress (not 2).
playbook_ability_bodyguard_description: When you protect a teammate, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.
playbook_ability_bravo_special_armor_des: Resist a complication related to physical obstacles or being outnumbered for you and your coterie (that you are present for). (NOTE: This Special Armor ability is granted on character creation. Check it off for free.)
playbook_ability_calculating_description: Due to your careful planning, during downtime, you may give yourself or another crew member +1 downtime action.
playbook_ability_call_the_target_descrip: You suffer no tier disadvantage when engaging in ranged combat.
playbook_ability_cloak_&_dagger_descript: When you use a disguise or other form of covert misdirection, you get +1d to rolls to confuse or deflect suspicion. When you throw off your disguise, the resulting surprise gives you the initiative in the situation.
playbook_ability_compartments_descriptio: Your items are built-in to your frame and may recess beneath panels out of sight. Your frame can now carry +2 load.
playbook_ability_compel_description: You can Attune to the ghost field to force a nearby ghost to appear and obey a command you give it. You are not supernaturally terrified by a ghost you summon or compel (though your allies may be).
playbook_ability_connected_description: During downtime, you get +1 result level when you acquire an asset or reduce heat.
playbook_ability_couth_special_armor_des: Resist a complication for you or coterie that results from talking your way out of, or running from, trouble (that you are present for). (NOTE: This Special Armor ability is granted on character creation. Check it off for free.)
playbook_ability_daredevil_description: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.
playbook_ability_dark_talent_description: Choose Insight, Prowess, or Resolve. Your max rating for actions under that attribute becomes 5. When you take this ability, add +1 dot to the resistance rating of the attribute you've chosen.
playbook_ability_dissipate_description: You can disperse the electroplasmic vapor of your ghostly form in order to pass through solid objects for a moment. Take 1 drain when you dissipate, plus 1 drain for each feature: It lasts longer (a minute — an hour — a day) — you also become invisible — anything that passes through your form becomes dangerously electrified or frozen.
playbook_ability_dont_make_me_descriptio: Aid another to ignore level 3 harm. Through tough-love yelling or gentle reassurances, you rally a coterie member. They ignore all non-fatal harm and harm penalties as long as you are with them.
playbook_ability_electroplasmic_projecto: You may release some of your plasmic energy as an electrical shock around you or as a directed beam. You may also use this ability to create a lightning barrier to repel or trap a spirit. Take 1 drain for each level of magnitude.
playbook_ability_expertise_blades_descri: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a group action using that action, you can suffer only 1 stress at most regardless of the number of failed rolls.
playbook_ability_expertise_description: Due to careful planning during downtime, you may give yourself or a coterie member one extra downtime activity. If you do not use this feature during your downtime, you may use it during the next errand to flashback without costing stress.
playbook_ability_eye_special_armor_descr: Resist a complication related to detection or security against you or your coterie (that you are present for). (NOTE: This Special Armor ability is granted on character creation. Check it off for free.)
playbook_ability_fascinate_description: You gain +1 effect when commanding attention magically. Your coterie gains +1d to the next action they take while you are the center of attention.
playbook_ability_focused_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to push yourself for ranged combat or tracking.
playbook_ability_foresight_blades_descri: Two times per score you can assist a teammate without paying stress. Tell us how you prepared for this.
playbook_ability_foresight_description: Twice per errand, you may assist a teammate without paying stress. Describe how you've prepared for it.
playbook_ability_fortitude_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or handling alchemicals.
playbook_ability_frame_upgrade_descripti: Choose an additional frame feature. This upgrade may be taken up to four times.
playbook_ability_functioning_vice_descri: When you indulge your vice, you may adjust the dice outcome by 1 or 2 (up or down). An ally who joins in your vice may do the same.
playbook_ability_gap_in_the_armor_descri: When you Survey, you may push yourself to find a weakness in an argument, gesture, or evasion, and press the advantage. Take +1d and +1 effect to the next roll that takes advantage of this information. NB. This bonus may be given to a coterie member.
playbook_ability_ghost_contract_descript: When you shake on a deal, you and your partner — human or otherwise — both bear a mark of your oath. If either breaks the contract, they take level 3 harm, "Cursed".
playbook_ability_ghost_fighter_descripti: You may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain potency in combat vs. the supernatural. You may grapple with spirits to restrain and capture them.
playbook_ability_ghost_form_description: You are now a concentration of electroplasmic vapor which resembles your living body and clothes. You may weakly interact with the physical world and vice versa. You're vulnerable to arcane powers and electroplasmic effects. You move about by floating and may fly swiftly without tiring. You may slowly flow through small openings as a vapor. You chill the area around you and are terrifying for the living to behold. You are affected by spiritbane charms (take 2 drain to overcome the repulsion). Whenever you would take stress, take drain instead. When you would take trauma, take gloom instead.
playbook_ability_ghost_hunter_descriptio: Your hunting pet is imbued with spirit energy. It gains potency when tracking or fighting the supernatural, and gains an arcane ability: ghost-form, mind-link, or arrow-swift. Take this ability again to choose an additional arcane ability for your pet.
playbook_ability_ghost_mind_description: You’re always aware of supernatural entities in your presence. Take +1d when you gather info about the supernatural.
playbook_ability_ghost_veil_description: You may shift partially into the ghost field, becoming shadowy and insubstantial for a few moments. Take 2 stress when you shift, plus 1 stress for each extra feature: It lasts for a few minutes rather than moments — you are invisible rather than shadowy — you may float through the air like a ghost
playbook_ability_ghost_voice_description: You know the secret method to interact with a ghost or demon as if it was a normal human, regardless of how wild or feral it appears. You gain potency when communicating with the supernatural.
playbook_ability_ghost_ward_description: You know how to Wreck an area with arcane substances and methods so it is either anathema or enticing to spirits (your choice).
playbook_ability_hawk_special_armor_desc: Resist a complication related to traps or ambushes against you or your coterie (that you are present for). (NOTE: This Special Armor ability is granted on character creation. Check it off for free.)
playbook_ability_honor_guard_description: Your formal training allows you the privilege of wearing your weapons openly anywhere, without repercussion. When commanding others to act or stand fast, take +1d.
playbook_ability_house_guard_description: When you protect a member of your coterie you resist with +1d. When you take harm, clear 1 stress.
playbook_ability_i_know_this_tune_descri: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.
playbook_ability_in_my_shadow_descriptio: When you lead a group action Skulk, you cannot take more than 1 stress, regardless of the number of failed rolls.
playbook_ability_infiltrator_description: You are not affected by quality or Tier when you bypass security measures.
playbook_ability_interface_description: You may attune to the local electroplasmic power field to control it or something connected to it (including another hull).
playbook_ability_invocation_description: You may push yourself to speak a curse, channeling arcane power and turning it against anyone in the area who is vulnerable to your assault. You may spend 1 stress for each additional feature: The damage is elemental (fire, lightning, acid, frost, etc.) — It affects objects as well as people — You and people you chose get +2d to resist the effects — You cast quickly and quietly, avoiding notice.
playbook_ability_iron_will_description: You're immune to the terror that some supernatural entities inflict on sight. Take +1d to resistance rolls with Resolve.
playbook_ability_jail_bird_description: When incarcerated, your wanted level counts as 1 less, your Tier as 1 more, and you gain +1 faction status with a faction you help on the inside (in addition to your incarceration roll).
playbook_ability_key_special_armor_descr: Resist a complication related to suspicion or persuasion (that you are present for). (NOTE: This Special Armor ability is granted on character creation. Check it off for free.)
playbook_ability_knack_special_armor_des: Resist a complication related to magic against you or your coterie (that you are present for). (NOTE: This Special Armor ability is granted on character creation. Check it off for free.)
playbook_ability_leader_description: When you Command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they're not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.
playbook_ability_leave_no_ground_descrip: Gain a new gather information question: "Where do they feel safe?" Take +1d to engagement rolls when acting on that information. When you engage in an errand on hostile ground, your coterie cannot begin in a desperate position. Tell the GM how you were prepared for trouble.
playbook_ability_like_looking_into_a_mir: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.
playbook_ability_like_water_description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, take +1d. When there's a question of who acts first, the answer is you.
playbook_ability_living_the_dream_descri: When you indulge during downtime, you may adjust the dice outcome by +/- 2. Any coterie member who joins you may do the same.
playbook_ability_manifest_description: Take 1 drain to flow through the electroplasmic pathways of the ghost field in order to instantly travel to any place you knew intimately in life, or to answer the summoning call of a compel.
playbook_ability_mastermind_description: You may expend your special armor to protect a teammate, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a long-term project.
playbook_ability_mesmerism_description: When you Sway someone, you may cause them to forget that it's happened until they next interact with you.
playbook_ability_mule_description: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.
playbook_ability_not_to_be_trifled_with_: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman — engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.
playbook_ability_occultist_description: You know the secret ways to Consort with ancient powers, forgotten gods or demons. Once you've consorted with one, you get +1d to command cultists who worship it.
playbook_ability_open_mind_description: You are always aware when the supernatural enters your vicinity, or when arcane power is building. Take +1d on your next action roll when acting on that knowledge.
playbook_ability_overcharge_description: Take 1 drain to perform a feat of extreme strength or speed (run faster than a horse, rend metal with bare hands, etc.). This factors into effect.
playbook_ability_party_crasher_descripti: Once per errand, any flashback where you have arranged a distraction or employed mayhem costs no stress. When drawing attention to yourself, gain +1 effect.
playbook_ability_physicker_description: You can Tinker with bones, blood, and bodily humours to treat wounds or stabilize the dying. You may study a malady or corpse. Everyone in your crew gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls.
playbook_ability_poltergeist_description: Take 1 drain to strongly interact with the physical world for a few moments (as if you had a normal body). Extend the reach and magnitude of your interaction to include telekinetic force and electroplasmic discharges by taking more drain (2-6).
playbook_ability_possess_description: You may attune to the ghost field in order to take control of a living body. When your control is challenged, you must re-attune (risking electroplasmic harm) or leave the body. Your control is challenged when: you consume spirit energy from the host — when arcane powers act against you — when the host's will is driven to desperation. You may easily and indefinitely possess a hull or hollow which has been ritually prepared for you (change your playbook to Hull or Vampire, respectively).
playbook_ability_predator_description: Take +1d to rolls against weakened or vulnerable targets. Whenever you gather information on a weakness or vulnerability, the worst result you can get is a 4/5.
playbook_ability_pry_description: Add to your list of gather information questions: "What are they thinking right now?" You magically intuit another peson's thought without consequence, and gain +1d to the engagement roll when you act upon this information. Pry can also be used during an errand, though be warned, it may create complications.
playbook_ability_reflexes_description: When there's a question about who acts first, the answer is you (two characters with Reflexes act simultaneously).
playbook_ability_rend_the_weave_descript: When you prepare a space with arcane reagents, it tears the fabric of the magical weave. Channeling in the area becomes impossible or unbelievably potent - your choice.
playbook_ability_ritual_description: You can Study an occult ritual (or create a new one) to summon a supernatural effect or being. You know the arcane methods to perform ritual sorcery. You begin with one ritual already learned.
playbook_ability_rook's_gambit_descripti: Take 2 stress to roll your best action rating while performing a different action. Say how you adapt your skill to this use.
playbook_ability_saboteur_description: When you Wreck, the work is much quieter than it should be and the damage is well-hidden from casual inspection.
playbook_ability_savage_description: When you unleash physical violence, it's especially frightening. When you Command a frightened target, take +1d.
playbook_ability_scout_description: When you gather info to locate a target, you get +1 effect. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, you get +1d to rolls to avoid detection.
playbook_ability_scrying_description: Spend 1 stress to remotely view a distant place or person taht is tied to you in some intimate way. Spend 1 stress for each extra feature: You see what happened in the past — Your target can also see and hear you — You may use something connected to the target as a focus, replacing the intimate tie requirement.
playbook_ability_secondary_hull_descript: Choose an additional frame and its starting feature. You may transfer your consciousness between your frames at will.
playbook_ability_shadow_description: You may push yourself to perform an act of stealth or athletics which borders on the superhuman.
playbook_ability_sharpshooter_descriptio: Push yourself to do one of the following: make a trick shot, disarm someone, make a ranged attack at extreme distance, or unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress your target. You retain the effects of pushing yourself.
playbook_ability_sinister_guile_descript: During downtime, choose one: Get a free additional downtime activity, or take +1d to all downtime activity rolls.
playbook_ability_skeleton_key_descriptio: Push yourself and roll your best action rating while performing a different action. Say how you adapt your skill to this use.
playbook_ability_strange_methods_descrip: When you invent or craft a creation with arcane features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one arcane design already known.
playbook_ability_subterfuge_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from suspicion or persuasion, or to push yourself for subterfuge.
playbook_ability_survivor_description: From hard won experience or occult ritual, you are immune to the poisonous miasma of the deathlands and are able to subsist on the strange flora and fauna there. You get +1 stress box.
playbook_ability_tempest_description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: unleash a stroke of lightning as a weapon — summon a storm in your immediate vicinity (torrential rain, roaring winds, heavy fog, chilling frost/snow, etc.).
playbook_ability_terrible_power_descript: Take 1 stress to perform a feat of superhuman strength or speed (run faster than a carriage, break stone with bare hands, leap onto the roof of a building, etc.). This factors into effect.
playbook_ability_terrifying_description: You have an air of menace and danger obvious to even the most unaware. You gain +1 effect when trying to intimidate someone. If done immediately after a show of force, also take +1d.
playbook_ability_the_devil's_footsteps_d: When you push yourself, choose one of the following additional benefits: perform a feat of athletics that verges on the superhuman — maneuver to confuse your enemies so they mistakenly attack each other.
playbook_ability_the_lords_charm_descrip: Take +1 effect to consort with someone when your purpose is to get them to break the rules, or wreck something.
playbook_ability_the_olde_tongue_descrip: You are always aware when the supernatural enters your vicinity, or when arcane power is building. Take +1d on your next action roll when acting on that knowledge.
playbook_ability_tough_as_nails_descript: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).
playbook_ability_triage_description: Patch yourself or someone else up, allowing them to ignore one level of harm penalty for the remainder of the errand. (Does not work on fatal Harm.) Each PC can only benefit from Triage once.
playbook_ability_trust_in_me_description: You get +1d vs. a target with whom you have an intimate relationship.
playbook_ability_undead_description: You are a spirit which animates an undead body. Your trauma is maxed out. Choose four trauma conditions which reflect your vampiric nature. Arcane attacks are potent against you. If you suffer fatal harm or trauma, your undead spirit is overwhelmed. You take level 3 harm: "Incapacitated" until you feed enough to recover. If you suffer arcane harm while in this state, you are destroyed utterly. Your XP tracks are longer (you now advance more slowly). You have more stress boxes.
playbook_ability_under_the_rug_descripti: During downtime, you gain +1 effect when you reduce exposure, and your shame level counts as 1 less for the purpose of entanglements so long as you explain the situation to your superiors.
playbook_ability_unstoppable_description: You may push yourself to accomplish a feat of speed or endurance that borders on the superhuman (eg. engage a small group on equal footing.)
playbook_ability_upon_a_needle_descripti:
You are sure-footed and gain +1 effect when balance or grace is an issue, such as navigating difficult terrain (or a dance floor.)
"How many angels can dance upon the head of a needle? Depends on the tune."
playbook_ability_vengeful_blades_descrip: You gain an additional xp trigger: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your crew helped you get payback, also mark crew xp.
playbook_ability_vengeful_description: Gain an addition xp trigger: "Did you get payback against someone who harmed you, your House, Coterie, or someone you care about?" If your coterie helped you get payback, also mark coterie xp. In addition, you gain +1 effect when acting to harm someone who has personally wronged you.
playbook_ability_venomous_description: Choose a drug or poison (from your bandolier stock) to which you have become immune. You can push yourself to secrete it through your skin or saliva or exhale it as a vapor.
playbook_ability_veteran_description: Choose a special ability from another source (can be taken more than once).
playbook_ability_vigorous_description: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.
playbook_ability_warded_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a supernatural consequence, or to push yourself when you deal with arcane forces.
playbook_ability_weaving_the_web_descrip: You gain +1d to Consort when you gather information on a target for a score. You get +1d to the engagement roll for that operation.
playbook_bravo_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with violence or panache.
playbook_couth_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with evasion and/or mayhem.
playbook_cutter_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with violence or coercion.
playbook_eye_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with stealth and/or perception.
playbook_ghost_xp_condition: You exacted vengeance upon those whom you deem deserving.
playbook_ghost_xp_condition2: You expressed your your outrage or anger, or settled scores from your heritage or background.
playbook_ghost_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your need or glooms during the session.
playbook_hawk_friend_3: Lucius - A Member of the Watch
playbook_hawk_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with pursuit or observation.
playbook_hound_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with tracking or violence.
playbook_hull_description: A spirit animating a clockwork frame
playbook_hull_xp_condition: You fulfilled your functions despite difficulty or danger.
playbook_hull_xp_condition2: You suppressed or ignored your former human beliefs, drives, heritage, or background.
playbook_hull_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your wear during the session.
playbook_item_a_concealable_weapon_descr: Discretion, thy name is valor. You have a weapon that you can carry nearly anywhere without detection.
playbook_item_a_familiar_spirit_descript: An arcane creature that is able to carry out simple tasks.
playbook_item_a_fine_bit_of_blackmail_de: You know how to hit them where it hurts.
playbook_item_a_fine_invitation_descript: You can acquire an invitation to any event, no matter how exclusive. Say how you acquired it.
playbook_item_a_frightening_weapon_descr: Your weapon has the ability to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.
playbook_item_a_small_pricey_gift_descri: It would be rude to show up empty-handed. Say what you've brought and why you chose it.
playbook_item_an_impressive_costume_desc: An ostentatious outfit that lets everyone know that a wizard has just entered the room, for when you want to be noticed.
playbook_item_fine_arcane_focus_descript: Describe what your focus looks like. Once per errand you may use it to increase your odds of success at a difficult task.
playbook_item_fine_courtly_clothes_descr: You are expert at looking your part. You have an outfit of the latest fashion at all times, and when you clean up, anyone unfamiliar with you assumes you are proper nobility — not a mere retainer.
playbook_item_fine_cover_identity_descri: You have all of the paperwork required to infiltrate most organizations temporarily.
playbook_item_fine_disguise_description: From costumes to makeup, you have the ability to affect a convincing disguise, making identification impossible safe for by those who know you intimately.
playbook_item_fine_inebriants_descriptio: A fine bottle of liquor, a vial of a potent recreational drug.
playbook_item_fine_lockpicks_description: Your lockpick kit is finely crafted, allowing you to crack locks above your natural ability and experience.
playbook_item_fine_tinkering_tools_descr: Masterfully crafted tools for manipulating tiny parts, like those found within a pocket watch or puzzle box.
playbook_item_fine_wrecking_tools_descri: Your wrecking tools are finely crafted, giving you an advantage against well-built or particularly sturdy obstacles.
playbook_item_polished_mirror_descriptio: Perfect for seeing discreetly under doors and around corners, or covertly signalling (for example).
playbook_item_ritual_implements_descript: You have a set of tools that are unique to you, for the purpose of casting ritual magic. You decide what is in your kit.
playbook_item_the_ladys_kiss_description: A powerful charm that protects against the supernatural.
playbook_item_vial_of_sweetsleep_descrip: A strong drug that renders unconscious any who inhale or ingest it. Most often found in a powdered form, but not always.
playbook_key_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with expertise and/or calculation.
playbook_knack_description:
An arcane expert,
seer of hidden worlds
playbook_knack_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with arcane knowledge and/or power.
playbook_leech_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with technical skill or mayhem.
playbook_lurk_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with stealth or evasion.
playbook_permission_a_believable_excuse_: You are a master at crafting plausible stories. Once per errand, when you give an excuse, the receiver will be inclined to believe you.
playbook_permission_a_fine_iron_nerve_de: Once per errand you can use your Fine Iron Nerve to resist the consequences of being terrified, unnerved, provoked, or discomfited.
playbook_permission_a_fine_photographic_: Once per errand you may call on your Fine Photographic Memory to recall the exact details of something you have seen in the past.
playbook_permission_a_fine_wit_descripti: Once per errand you may use your Fine Wit to deflect or turn a conversation in your favor.
playbook_permission_a_lucky_break_descri: Once per errand you may use a Lucky Break to change your fortune.
playbook_permission_a_vulgar_display_of_: Once per errand you may use your Vulgar Display of Power to use your knack in a flashy or dangerous way. Say what you're doing and what your intended goal is.
playbook_slide_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with deception or in influence.
playbook_spider_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with calculation or conspiracy.
playbook_vampire_description: A spirit animating an undead body
playbook_vampire_xp_condition: You displayed your dominance or slayed without mercy.
playbook_vampire_xp_condition2: You expressed your beliefs, drives, heritage, or background.
playbook_vampire_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your vice, traumas, or strictures during the session.
playbook_whisper_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with knowledge or arcane power.
prowess_description: Resist consequences from physical strain or injury.
prowl_description: Prowl about unseen and traverse obstacles; climb, swim, run, jump, and tumble. Ambush with close violence — a backstab, throat cutting, black-jack, etc.
query_for_consequence: Query for consequence name when resisting
recoveryblurb: Get treatment in downtime to activate your healing project clock
resist_instructions: Suffer 6 stress minus the highest die result. When you roll a critical on resistance, clear 1 stress.
resolve_description: Resist consequences from mental strain or willpower.
show_broadcast: Show broadcast buttons for sending information to chat
show_cohort_section: Show cohort section on character sheet
show_outline: Show outline for active input fields
skirmish_description: Skirmish with an opponent in close combat; attack and defend in a visions back and forth; start, survive, or finish a fight.
skulk_description: Move carefully and keep to the shadows; use sleight of hand to plant or retrieve objects; act without being seen, through misdirection, finesse, or evasion.
spirit_description: Resist consequences from mental strain or willpower.
strictures_bestial: When you suffer physical harm or overindulge your vice, your body twists into a horrific bestial form until you next feed without overindulging.
strictures_bound: Your spirit must remain in this body, or be destroyed.
strictures_forbidden: You cannot enter a private residence without permission from the owner.
strictures_repelled: Spiritbane charms can hold you at bay. (Take 2 stress to resist the repulsion.)
strictures_slumber: In downtime, you must spend one activity resting in a dark, silent place (or else suffer 3 stress).
stricturesblurb: When you gain a new vampire trait (except veteran), add a stricture.
study_description: Study a person, document, or item with close scrutiny to gather information and apply knowledge; read an opponent's intentions and desires; research and discover.
subterfuge_supplies_description: A theatrical make-up kit. A selection of blank documents, ready for the forger's hand. Costume jewelry. A reversible cloak and distinctive hat. A forged badge of office.
survey_description: Survey a location or situation to understand what's going on; sense trouble before it happens; gather information about opportunities or exploits.
sway_description: Sway someone with charm, logic, deception, disguise, or bluff; change attitudes or behavior with manipulation, argument, or seduction.
tinker_description: Tinker with mechanisms to create, adapt, disable, or repair; disable a trap, pick a lock, or crack a safe. Use the traps, mechanisms, or strange chemicals and artifacts around the city to your advantage.
tinkering_tools_description: An assortment for detailed mechanist work: jeweler’s loupe, tweezers, a small hammer, pliers, screwdriver, etc.
upgrade_boat_description: You have a boat, a dock on a waterway, and a small shack to store boating supplies. A second upgrade improves the boat with armor and more cargo capacity.
upgrade_carriage_description: You have a carriage, two goats to pull it, and a stable. A second upgrade improves the carriage with armor and larger, swifter goats. Horses are very rare in Doskvol — most carriages in the city use the large Akorosian goat as their draft animal.
upgrade_gear_description: +1 quality for Burglary Gear and Climbing Gear.
upgrade_hidden_description: Your lair has a secret location and is disguised to hide it from view. If your lair is discovered, use two downtime activities and pay coin equal to your Tier to relocate it and hide it once again.
upgrade_insight_description: Earn 2 xp when training insight during downtime.
upgrade_mastery_description: Your crew has access to master level training. You may advance your PCs' action ratings to 4 (until you unlock this upgrade, PC action ratings are capped at 3). This costs four upgrade boxes to unlock.
upgrade_personal_description: Earn 2 xp when training playbook during downtime.
upgrade_prowess_description: Earn 2 xp when training prowess during downtime.
upgrade_quarters_description: Your lair includes living quarters for the crew. Without this upgrade, each PC sleeps elsewhere, and is vulnerable when they do so.
upgrade_resolve_description: Earn 2 xp when training resolve during downtime.
upgrade_secure_description: Your lair has locks, alarms, and traps to thwart intruders. A second upgrade improves the defenses to include arcane measures that work against spirits. You might roll your crew's Tier if these measures are ever put to the test, to see how well they thwart an intruder.
upgrade_tools_description: +1 quality for Demolition Tools and Tinkering Tools.
upgrade_vault_description: Your lair has a secure vault, increasing your storage capacity for coin to 8. A second upgrade increases your capacity to 16. A separate part of your vault can be used as a holding cell.
upgrade_workshop_description: Your lair has a workshop appointed with tools for tinkering and alchemy, as well as a small library of books, documents, and maps. You may accomplish long-term projects with these assets without leaving your lair.
upon_crew_advance: Upon crew advance, each PC gets Stash = Tier+2
use_kirsty: Use Kirsty font if installed (only check if you have Kirsty)
vampire_viceblurb: Your vice is life essence, consumed from a living human. Use 1 downtime activity to hunt prey and indulge your vice. Also, when you feed, erase all level 1 harm and mark 4 ticks on your healing clock. This is is the only way you can heal. How do you feed? What telltale sign do you leave on your victims?
vehicle_edges_flaws:
Vehicle Edges
Nimble: The vehicle handles easily. Consider this an assist for tricky maneuvers.
Simple: The vehicle is easy to repair. Remove all of its harm during downtime.
Sturdy: The vehicle keeps operating even when broken.

Vehicle Flaws
Costly: Thee vehicle costs 1 coin per downtime to keep in operation.
Distinct: Thee vehicle has memorable features. Take +1 heat when you use it on a score.
Finicky: The vehicle has quirks that only one person understands. When operated without them, the vehicle has -1 quality.
vice_info: Faith — Gambling — Luxury — Obligation — Pleasure — Stupor — Weird
vice_instructions: Clear an amount of stress equal to the highest die result. If the result of your vice roll means you clear more stress levels than you had marked, you overindulge.
warblurb1: When you're at war with any number of factions (status -3), the following penalties apply:
warblurb2: Lose 1 hold (temporarily, while the war persists). This may knock you down a Tier.
warblurb3: PCs get only one free downtime action instead of two.
warblurb5: Your claims which generate coin (vice dens, fighting pits, fences, etc.) produce only half their normal income (round down).
when_you_use_bandolier: When you use a bandolier slot, choose an alchemical:
wreck_description: Wreck a place, item, or obstacle with savage force or carefully applied sabotage; breach defenses with force; ruin a party; create distractions and chaos.
xp_beliefs: You expressed your beliefs, drives, heritage, or background.
xp_bolster: Bolster your crew's reputation or develop a new one.
xp_contend: Contend with challenges above your current station.
xp_crew_specific: Enter your crew's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_desperate: Every time you roll a desperate action, mark xp in that action's attribute.
xp_express: Express the goals, drives, inner conflict, or essential nature of the crew.
xp_scandal: You struggled with issues from your indulgences or scandals during the session.
xp_specific: Enter your playbook's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_specific_extra: Enter another specific way to mark XP here.
xp_top: At the end of each session, for each item below, mark 1 xp (or instead mark 2 xp if that item occurred multiple times).
xp_vice: You struggled with issues from your vice or traumas during the session.
zerodice: Zero Dice — take the lowest result above
